projects.title: Ngambiskuy
projects.description: Ngambiskuy is an Indonesian all-in-one educational platform for learning, teaching, and interactive exam simulations.

projects.title: Statistics Indonesia Datalab
projects.description: StatInaLab is a secure microdata access platform by BPS-Statistics Indonesia, using a virtual desktop and the 5 Safes framework. I was the initial system developer, focusing on design and business logic.

projects.title: Ikatan Fisioterapi Indonesia
projects.description: IFI (Indonesian Physiotherapy Association) is the official organization for physiotherapists in Indonesia, promoting professional development and representing the country in World Physiotherapy since 1991.

projects.title: SEPAKAT - Meeting Management System
projects.description: Meeting management system I developed for internal use in my office-BPS Statistics Pontianak Municipality. It streamlines the planning, scheduling, documentation, and follow-up of meetings, ensuring better coordination, transparency, and efficiency across departments.

projects.title: SIKOMO - Survey Partner Coordination System
projects.description: Internal system I developed to manage partner coordination for surveys in my office. It automates the process of assigning tasks, coordinating between teams, and most importantly, generating official contract documents efficiently and accurately.

projects.title: Gass Education
projects.description: Indonesian online platform that helps students prepare for entrance exams to government-affiliated higher education institutions. It offers study materials, tryouts, and expert guidance, especially for those aiming for Politeknik Statistika STIS.
